title: League Client Won't Start After clicking Launch
body: So I've had this problem for a decent amount of time, but it eventually fixes itself somehow, but when I want to play, it never starts. I click Launch, nothing happens, I look in Task Manager and it's in processes so it's working in the background but no application pops up, I have tried multiple fixes like reinstalling, deleting the RAD folder,  My internet is fine so that isn't an issue and running as administrator, and still nothing works. Please someone help, I Don't want to stop playing the game that got me into PC gaming..

replies.body: I need help plz, my league client won't start after I press "launch" I have tried many things and read on about it but I cant find something that will work o my computer.

PLEASE HELP ASAP! I cannot recover the game! I am logged into my account. A few days ago BugSlpat had a pop up message but I closed it instead of reading it. Ever since I cannot launch League. I've tried reloading it MANY times and keep getting error messages. I am playing on a Mac OSX 10.7.5

Hey, same problem here.
Went to beta some time ago and really enjoyed, but was experiencing lag and packet loss, so changed back to Legacy and it all went.
Since then I have been having problems just trying to launch it. I press launch and the mouse shows it loading, but no login window appears; and same as you, it is running in background via the task manager.
Have tried everything I have found on the internet, both new and old... and nothing seems to help.

This issue has historically been caused by your connection to our login servers being *poor or unstable*. You should be able to resolve this by configuring your local network settings according to our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

If you experience further issues with this, hit me up.
